name: Dr. Géza Gergely Ambrus
title: Lab Head
bio: Dr. Géza Gergely Ambrus is cognitive neuroscientist with a research focus on the neural signatures of perception,  memory and learning.

publications.title: Shared neural codes of recognition memory
Your place or mine? The neural dynamics of personally familiar scene recognition suggests category independent familiarity encoding
